channel.title: Announcement on Data & Science: A blog
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on Data & Science: A blog

item.title: First post!
item.description: After a few Wordpress blogs, a Django experiment and a test of Flask, I’ve decided to get my feet wet with Jekyll. Thanks to Dean for the beautiful Jekyll template, beautiful-jekyll, the site is already looking nice. Hope you come along for the ride!
